xyz.morphia.dao

Interface DAO<T,K>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Java type serviced by this DAO
    K - The Key type used by the entity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDAO, DAO

    public interface DAO<T,K>
    Defines a basic interface for use in applications
